mapper.select: SELECT A."hihokenshaNo", A."shinseishoSakuseiSetaiKijunYMD", A."rirekiNo" FROM (SELECT B."hihokenshaNo" AS "hihokenshaNo", B."shinseishoSakuseiSetaiKijunYMD" AS "shinseishoSakuseiSetaiKijunYMD", B."rirekiNo" AS "rirekiNo", row_number() OVER (PARTITION BY B."hihokenshaNo" ORDER BY B."rirekiNo" DESC) AS rirekiNo FROM rgdb."DbT3116KijunShunyugakuTekiyoKanri" AS B WHERE B."setaiCode" = #{世帯コード} AND B."nendo" = #{処理年度}) AS A
